Hi {{ guest_name }},

We're so glad you visited {{ branch_name }}! Thank you for taking the time to connect with us.

We'd love to help you get connected and learn more about our church family. Here are some next steps:

1. Join us again this Sunday
2. Check out our small groups
3. Let us know how we can pray for you

Blessings,
The {{ branch_name }} Team
